Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/27/1988 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: CF Ken Griffey Jr., 1B Cecil Fielder, C Craig Biggio, C Rick Wilkins. Going to CHC: P Randy Johnson)...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1989, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1989, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Injured on 6/15/1989 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/26/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
